Package org.codehaus.xfire.util

Class Summary
Base64  
CachedOutputStream  
ClassLoaderUtils This class is extremely useful for loading resources and classes in a fault tolerant manner that works across different applications servers.
ClassReader This is the class file reader for obtaining the parameter names for declared methods in a class.
DeleteOnCloseFileInputStream  
DOMUtils Few simple utils to read DOM.
DOMUtils.NullResolver  
FastStack  
JavaUtils  
LoggingHandler Logs a message to a commons logging Log at the INFO level.
MethodComparator  
NamespaceHelper Namespace utilities.
OutMessageDataSource This will create a DataSource from a message for use in Attachments.
ParamReader This is the class file reader for obtaining the parameter names for declared methods in a class.
Resolver Resolves a File, classpath resource, or URL according to the follow rules: Check to see if a file exists, relative to the base URI. If the file doesn't exist, check the classpath If the classpath doesn't exist, try to create URL from the URI.
ServiceUtils Helps when constructing, or using services.
STAXUtils Common StAX utilities.
UID
